Name: :code:`filter`
Description: The active filter that is applied to the backing metadata.

Name: :code:`filterError`
Description: The current error that the filter throws upon filtering. Empty if no error.

Name: :code:`symphonySpec`
Description: The specification holding the file paths and other general information.

Name: :code:`groupColumns`
Description: Columns by which the metadata is grouped.

Name: :code:`groupNames`
Description: Names of all the groups. Result of a Cartesian product between all group names.

Name: :code:`selected`
Description: A list of all selected data samples.

Name: :code:`tooltip`
Description: Specification of the position and content of the tooltip.

Name: :code:`showRaw`
Description: Whether to show the unfiltered data alongside the filtered data (mostly used for charts).
